# Random Percentage Meter [(by GinjaFlame)](https://www.twitch.tv/ginjaflame)

## Description
Gives targeted user a random % of something. ie, 5% derpy, 72% cute, 40% lewd.

## Import Code
```

```

## Installation
1. Import the code.
2. Create a Command point it to "cracked"
3. If you don't wish to use the term  'cracked' you can change it in the `Message` Sub-Action
